Uses of Class
SystemA.FilterFramework

    • Uses of FilterFramework in SystemA

      Subclasses of FilterFramework in SystemA 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AltConverterA
      This is one of the converter filters for SystemA, it takes altitude data and converts from feet to meters, writing the data to the downstream.
      class  FilterTemplate
      File:FilterTemplate.java Course: 17655 Project: Assignment 1 Copyright: Copyright (c) 2003 Carnegie Mellon University Versions: 1.0 November 2008 - Initial rewrite of original assignment 1 (ajl).
      class  MergeFilterA
      This method takes input from both the altitude converter and the temperature converter, merging the inputstreams for the sink filter to write to output.
      class  SinkFilterA
      This class is the Sink Filter for SystemA.
      class  SourceFilterA
      This class is the Source Filter for SystemA.
      class  SplitterFilterA
      This is SplitterFilter for SystemA.
      class  TempConverterA
      This is one of the converter filters for SystemA, it takes temperature data and converts from feet to meters, writing the data to the downstream.
